name: Anonymous
comment: I'm not too bothered about whichever way this vote goes. I'd argue that it's more worthwhile to save for a 2 or 3 gem upgrade but mostly I just wanna get a shield made or reinforce our cuirass with aethersteel and carapace and get on with the hidden fire zone. We made a lot of progress last thread and it was great but there was none of the action I crave.
